page.title: 07NEW ROMNEY PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: I WENT TO THE PLAYSCHOOL IN QUEENS ROAD.I WAS ABOUT THREE WHEN I STARTED AND IT WAS MY FIFTH BIRTHDAY WHEN I LEFT.WHEN I WENT TO THE INFANTS I WAS FIVE YEARS OLD.THERE IS A STONE PLAYGROUND WITH MARKINGS THERE IS A GRASS FIELD WITH TWO CLIMBING FRAMES SOME SPIRAL UPRIGHT LOGS AND A BOAT.THERE ARE ABOUT ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY PEOPLE IN IT.THE AGE RANGE IS FIVE TO SEVEN.I WAS SEVEN YEARS WHEN I STARTED THE JUNIORS.THERE ARE NINE CLASSES.THERE IS A FOOTBALL TEAM AND A NETBALL TEAM WHICH PLAY GAMES WITH LOCAL TEAMS.WE HAVE A CONCRETE PLAYGROUND WITH SOME GRASS WITH A CLIMBING FRAME.THE AGE RANGE IS SEVEN TO ELEVEN YEARS OLD.THERE ARE ABOUT TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY PEOPLE IN THE SCHOOL.ALL THE SCHOOLS ARE TWO MINUTES WALK FROM THE HIGH STREET.
